PrisonerInteractionModeDef.label: enslave
PrisonerInteractionModeDef.description: Wardens will threaten the prisoner to reduce their will. Once they have no will left, the warden will enslave them.

PrisonerInteractionModeDef.label: reduce will
PrisonerInteractionModeDef.description: Wardens will threaten the prisoner to reduce their will, but won't enslave them.

PrisonerInteractionModeDef.label: convert
PrisonerInteractionModeDef.description: Wardens will attempt to convert the prisoner to their ideoligion.
